author: fungl
title: Vinegar Hill House
description: Seasonal New American cooking served in a cozy, salvaged-decor setting with a garden.

author: alturkir
title: IRIS Tea & Bakery
description: Coffee is individually brewed with Italian imported coffee beans for a smooth, rich taste. All of our drinks are handcrafted and made to order. Our store has bread and pastries that are always baked fresh hourly. Our gourmet cakes are uniquely crafted by our sensational cake chefs. We strive to bring our customers the best products possible by paying careful attention to every detail which may affect its taste. We hope you enjoy what we have at Iris Bakery

author: krishnap
title: Dekalb Market Hall
UserRatings: Great spot for a perfect brunch!
description: Bustling destination that includes old-school & new-school NYC names

author: gorem
title: Brooklyn Bridge Park Boathouse
description: Canoe & kayak rental service in Brooklyn, New York

author: shahm
title: Delaware Water Gap
description: The Delaware Water Gap is on the border of New Jersey and Pennsylvania where the Delaware River cuts through a large ridge of the Appalachian Mountains.

author: jangamp
title: Brooklyn Grange
description: Brooklyn Grange is a 2.5-acre organic urban rooftop farm in New York City, growing high quality vegetables and honey for local restaurants, markets, and community-supported agriculture.

author: marris
title: Athleta
description: athletic activity or skill and involves a degree of competition, such as tennis or basketball. Some games and many kinds of racing are called sports. A professional at a sport is called an athlete.
